examples.example: 只要我们坚定心中的方向，就一定能走向成功的彼岸。

translate.english: As long as we firmly hold the direction in our hearts, we will surely be able to move towards the other side of success.

examples.example: 我们要明确自己人生的方向，然后坚定不移地朝着目标前进。

translate.english: We should clarify the direction of our own life, and then move forward firmly towards the goal.

examples.example: 无论前方道路多么曲折，我们都要找准自己的方向，勇敢前行。

translate.english: No matter how tortuous the road ahead is, we all have to find our own direction and move forward bravely.
